Utils
service in module intermesh.core

Description

Common utilities

Methods

  • url(route, Key)

    Create a URL to the API server

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    routestring

    The controller route. Eg. intermesh/auth/auth/login

    Key
    (optional)
    		object

    value pair with GET parameters. If the value is not a string it will be converted to JSON.

    Returns
    string

    URL The Full url
